title: Transformative Language Learning Design Leveraging Narrative Distance

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Intermediate-Level Language Comprehension
context.additional_context: Microlearning content design for smartphone-based mobile environments. Learners complete short modules in daily life and undergo project-based assessments evaluating language proficiency and problem-solving skills holistically.

learning_goals: Learners can perform critical thinking in diverse contexts through narrative distancing techniques in language content.
Over four weeks, learners can analyze narrative scenarios provided three times weekly on a mobile platform to derive language usage patterns and apply them to real-life problems.
Learners can collaboratively complete and submit a language project (e.g., writing dialogue scenarios to resolve cultural conflicts) with peers, reflecting narrative distance.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
